articles.title: Projected U.S. Combined War Exercises under Fire
articles.content:
British Preparatory Committee Inaugurated 
    Pyongyang, March 18 (KCNA) -- The British preparatory committee for commemorating the Day of the Sun was inaugurated in London on March. 9. 
 Christopher Coleman, spokesman for the Central Committee of the Revolutionary Communist Party of Britain (Marxist��Leninist� who is its leader, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.    
 The committee decided to organize colorful functions including meetings and photo exhibitions and film shows on the occasion of the significant day.
